long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool that helps users download Telegram audio/video to a computer. We advise users not to get copyrighted content without permission.

## Features

Telegram video downloader features:

✓ Save audio/video from any channel/group to a local computer.
✓ Supports one-click multi-select batch/single download of resources in multiple formats,include videos/audio/pictures/GIFs/movies/music/audiobooks/files. Format-inclusive  MP4, MP3, M4A, 3GP, FLC, MPEG,JPG,PNG,GIF, etc.
✓ No passwords, API logins, or permissions are required
✓ Safe and easy to use
✓ 24/7 developer support
✓ Free users are limited to daily usage
✓ Subscribers have unlimited daily usage

Run on Chrome web pages, you can use it online on Mac and Windows computers. Just install it on your browser, no software is required.

## Use Guide

Use Guide For You:

- Install the chrome extension.
- Click the "Extension" button next to your profile avatar and select the plug-in, click the "Pushpin" icon on the right to pin it in the toolbar.
- Click the toolbar plug-in icon or open the Telegram web version (https://web.telegram.org/k)
- Multi-select batch download:
Browse the dialog contents of a channel or group, and the toolbar plug-in icon will display the number of captured resources. Click the plug-in icon on the toolbar to open the plug-in window for batch saving of resources.
= After installing the plug-in, a "Download" button will appear under the music/audiobooks/video/picture in the dialog box of each channel or group

## Disclaimer
This extension is not affiliated with the official Telegram app/website. This is an unofficial application developed and maintained independently.
